sections.text: The proceeds of the sales and use tax imposed by a county under section 13-319 shall be distributed to the county for deposit in its general fund.SourceLaws 1996, LB 1177, ยง 12.

13-325.County sales and use tax; distribution.

The proceeds of the sales and use tax imposed by a county under section 13-319 shall be distributed to the county for deposit in its general fund.

SourceLaws 1996, LB 1177, ยง 12.
